bibl.title: Short Note: 059 (0215) and Mark 15:28.
bibl.note: P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 36112 + 39779 (= van Haelst 397; LDAB 9210). - Discusses the codicological relation of the fragments to one another, which shows the omission of Mark 15:28.

bibl.title: TC: A Journal of Biblical Textual Criticism

bibl.seg: Dirk Jongkind, Short Note: 059 (0215) and Mark 15:28.
TC: A Journal of Biblical Textual Criticism 19 (2014) 3 pp., 4 figg. coul.
P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 36112 + 39779 (= van Haelst 397; LDAB 9210). - Discusses the codicological relation of the fragments to one another, which shows the omission of Mark 15:28.
